Datanesia home articles events datasets applications

Datanesia.org is a collaborative effort to collect, organize, and provide better access to datasets and data related information in Indonesia. Open, for all.
Started by ramda, OKFN Indonesia and Asia Knowledge and Innovation Lab
Maintained by andra. Have questions ? Send me an email

Events

  • Open Data Day - International events celebrating the open data movement
